Description: Coefficient of variation, ratio of the standard deviation to the mean (a measure of relative variability).
label: coeff. Variation
Delay in irrigable area halved D/S (intervention s.)

Description: Livestock keepers profit (USD) per Tropical Livestock Unit.
label: profit per TLU

Description: Years from the start o the implementation of the intervention to the end.
label: Project time horizon
Rainfed crop area in ha (intervention s.)

Description: Percentage risk that the necessary donors (local and national goverments, local NGOs) will not help with the implentation of the intervention strip intervention.
label: Risk donors non involv (intervention s.)

Description: Percentage risk that the necessary institutions (local and national goverments, local NGOs) will not help with the implentation of the intervention strip intervention.
label: Risk instit. non involv (intervention s.)

Description: Percentage risk that a chosen intervention will be poorly designed.
label: Risk of bad design

Description: Percentage risk that a chosen intervention will be poorly managed.
label: Risk of bad maintenance

Description: Percentage risk that a natural hazard may occur.
label: Risk of natural hazard

Description: Percentage risk that the communities surrounding the reservoir will not comply with requirements for intervention effectiveness.
label: Risk of non compliance

Description: Percentage risk that the communities surrounding the reservoir will not help with the implentation of the intervention strip intervention.
label: Risk pop non involv (intervention s.)

Description: Tropical Livestock Units that are kept in the reservoir area and, at least partly, dependent on reservoir water
label: TLU (baseline)

Description: Percentage change (reduction or growth of population) in Tropical Livestock Units that are kept in the reservoir area if the intervention strips are implemented
label: TLU change if intervention s.
